title: 🧈 "Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it." - Julia Child
content:
Given a string that represents a markdown table, return a formatted markdown table. A formatted markdown table means that the width of each column is the width of the longest cell in the column.

Example:

Input:
| Syntax | Description |
| --- | ----------- |
| Header | Title |
| Paragraph | Text |

Output:
| Syntax    | Description |
| --------- | ----------- |
| Header    | Title       |
| Paragraph | Text        |
